name: The Ultimate Islands In The Sun Quiz | Physical Geography

questions.text: Which is not among the world's ten largest islands?
questions.explanation:
Newfoundland.

	Newfoundland is 42,031 sq miles in area making it the world's 15th largest island.

New Britain.

	Despite its British name New Britain is actually part of Papua New Guinea

questions.text: In which ocean is the island of Diego Garcia?
questions.explanation:
Indian.

	Diego Garcia is now part of the British Indian Ocean Territory and is used as a forward base for military missions in the Arabian sea

questions.text: The Indonesian island of Timor was divided in half with the western half under Indonesian rule. Who ruled the eastern half of the island?
questions.explanation:
Portugal.

	The Portugese relinquished sovereignty of East Timor resulting in civil unrest and a military crackdown by the Indonesians.

questions.text: Another island divided in half and claimed by both Greece and Turkey was?
questions.explanation:
Cyprus.

	Cyprus was split in half in 1974 with the south of the island being claimed by Greece and the northern half in Turkish hands.

questions.text: Which is not an island in the Mediterranean Sea?
questions.explanation:
Tenerife.

	Tenerife is part of the Canaries which are also Spanish dependencies

questions.text: Which is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Wight.

	The Isle of Wight is off the English coast. The others are the Channel Islands off the French coast but under British rule.

questions.text: What are Islay, Jura, Arran, Rhum and Canna?
questions.explanation:
Scottish Islands.

	All islands off the rugged west coast of Scotland

questions.text: Where are the islands that make up Franz Josef Land?
questions.explanation:
Arctic Ocean.

	Russian islands in the frozen arctic wastes

New York.

	Long Island makes up the easternmost boroughs of New York City (Brooklyn and Queens) as well as Nassau and Suffolk Counties NY
